result.reason: The issue lacks an actionable problem statement and acceptance criteria, and recent comments show stale status without verified behavior on current builds.
result.approach: Request a fresh test on v1.79.x/dev plus concrete sync requirements, reproducible workflow, expected behavior, and conflict-handling rules before scoping implementation.
